text:
February 10, 2017 1. PC's Response To Body Shamers Who Hounded Her With 'Nose Job' Questions Deserves An Applause 
PC recently dropped by on the sets of The View and gave an apt reply to all the haters. She said, "There is such a false perception about what women should look like and what our bodies should look like. Especially when you are in the business, you put on a couple of pounds and people are like..body shaming you. It happens. Christmas happens to all of us. I am an Indian. I have Holi, I have Diwali, I have hundred holidays and my body fluctuates and you know what I am fine with it." 2. A bollywoodlife.com report claims, "Rajamouli is currently busy with Baahubali 2 , but he is thrilled about Mahabharat . He wants to take Aamir Khan, Rajinikanth, and Mohanlal on board for this project. He is yet to decide on the characters these stars will portray."
